title: Integrated Social Studies-Based Professional Science Literacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Professional Work Experience
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to improve scientific decision-making within socioscientific contexts, operated in a smartphone-based microlearning environment with assessments directly linked to job performance enhancement.

learning_goals: Learners can conduct integrated analyses of professional field problems by connecting social contexts with scientific principles
Learners can achieve over 80% of weekly learning objectives using 15-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments
Learners can identify at least three socioscientific elements in the scientific decision-making process through formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
